local_intent: Execute grasp of white_plate using grasp_white_plate and verify stability
assumptions: white_plate is within sensor view or detectable with retries
grasp_white_plate key will be produced by ComputeGraspPose if not already present
Timeouts (1200 ms) are sufficient for perception and motions
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'grasp' phase from GLOBAL_BT: detect white plate, move above, compute grasp, align, pick, and verify IsGraspStable. Timeouts and strategies match GLOBAL_BT/GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
